name: Prowler's Claw
tooltip:
Prowler's Claw

Cost: 3200


+21 Lethality (13.07 − 21 (based on level) armor penetration)

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 lethality.

UNIQUE Active - Sandswipe: After a 0.2-second cast time, dash in a line through the target enemy's location, and upon completing the dash, deal 100 (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage to the target and increase your damage dealt to them by 15% for the next 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
